deal.product_description: The DC House 36V 100Ah Golf Cart Battery provides reliable power with advanced data monitoring via Bluetooth connectivity. This lithium iron phosphate battery offers superior safety and longevity, perfect for enhancing your golf cart's performance. The mobile app allows you to track essential information like state of charge (SOC), voltage, and current data from up to 20 meters away, empowering you to stay informed and in control of your energy usage. Ideal for golf enthusiasts looking for a high-performance battery solution.
